body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling Vincenzo's Benzos. My name is Douglas Hayes. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Douglas, my name is Ann Lee.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Ann! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm interested in one of your cars and wanted to get more details.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course, Ann. Could you please tell me the model you're interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm looking at the Sedan XS.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great choice! Could you provide your contact number in case we need to reach you with additional information?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my number is five five five, two three four, one zero zero zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Ann. Lastly, can I have your email address so we can send you some detailed specifications and offers?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's ann.lee@email.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect. Ann, thank you for providing that information. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thanks, Douglas!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Ann! Thank you for your time. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!

body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Douglas Hayes and the customer's name is Ann Lee.  The conversation is about Vincenzo's Benzos (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.
